pageContext.claim: “ And that night, and the next day, all we did is get trashed in the papers, that there were protests [in Pittsburgh] -- tiny little protests that were so far away from us, and it was really unfair. It was fake news.”
pageContext.analysis: There was nothing "fake" about the reporting on protests in Pittsburgh during Trump's visit. Trump may not have seen the demonstrations, but the Post reported at least 2,000 people attended.
